destinations.name: Bali
destinations.description: Bali is an Indonesian island known for its forested volcanic mountains, iconic rice paddies, beaches and coral reefs.

destinations.name: Paris
destinations.description: Paris, France's capital, is a major European city and a global center for art, fashion, gastronomy and culture.

destinations.name: New York
destinations.description: New York City comprises 5 boroughs sitting where the Hudson River meets the Atlantic Ocean.

destinations.name: Tokyo
destinations.description: Tokyo, Japanâ€™s busy capital, mixes the ultramodern and the traditional, from neon-lit skyscrapers to historic temples.

destinations.name: Sydney
destinations.description: Sydney, capital of New South Wales and one of Australia's largest cities, is best known for its harbourfront Sydney Opera House.

activities.name: Hiking
activities.description: Hiking is the preferred term, in Canada and the United States, for a long, vigorous walk, usually on trails (footpaths), in the countryside, while the word walking is used for shorter, particularly urban walks.

activities.name: Cycling
activities.description: Cycling, also called biking or bicycling, is the use of bicycles for transport, recreation, exercise or sport.

activities.name: Swimming
activities.description: Swimming is an individual or team racing sport that requires the use of one's entire body to move through water.

activities.name: Running
activities.description: Running is a method of terrestrial locomotion allowing humans and other animals to move rapidly on foot.

activities.name: Yoga
activities.description: Yoga is a group of physical, mental, and spiritual practices or disciplines which originated in ancient India.
